title: I only got skin discounts for champions I don't use. What?
body: It appears as if the "discount bot" just picked what ever it pleased, I thought the offers were based (at least some) in your most played champions.  But offers appear to be totally random. Been working hard to get Mastery 7 on Bard lately and I expected to at least get Bard Bard,  oh well.  {{item:3070}} {{champion:432}}

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Your Shop Issues - We are aware of issues with “Your Shop” not showing the correct personalized offers. We are deactivating the feature until we can fix the issue.

[Source.](https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na)
You're welcome! Also, we're officially friends because you put a Nami emoji. <3
:o What's your handle? I'll follow ya back!
Fixed now, I actually got Bard Bard, lol.
I appear to be having the same issue, getting skins for champions that I never have played or even have unlocked but on the bright side I got an awesome Karma skin that I wanted lol
